Text.Page: You entered the Ebon Tower and defeated Thulsa, who ran, leaving a trail of blood behind him. Kelsaik was nowhere to be seen....

I knew my purification totem would be useful! Good against all kinds of things...including Kelsaik's poison, if it comes to that. You've fought Kelsaik before, so you would know better than I would.

If you make multiple forays in the Ebon Tower, pick up a purification totem before you go. Bring the materials, and I'll do the rest.

The teleportal in the Ebon Tower won't work no matter what you do. There's only one key that works, and it's...

...Killian's gem? You have it? And you're going in?

Here's what we know; it's not much. There are five levels in the tower, and everything's toxic, thanks to Thulsa. Don't forget to use that purification totem.
You have activated the teleportal using Killian's gem. A portal to the Ebon Tower is opening.
It's time to use Killian's gem.
You have investigated the teleportal in the Ebon Tower. Traces of Thulsa's magic sustain it, and it vibrates in resonance with another teleportal nearby...over there!
